overview: For 10 days the team accompanied Everton  and the crew of the vessel 20 de Janeiro  down the lower Taquari River.  The silting up of  rivers, especially Taquari, is a central theme that  demonstrates the difficulties with a river that  one side flooded and the other, where the film is approached, was  drying ... drying ... where's Rio?
title: Finado Taquari
